title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Dr. <!--more--> Larry Malerba and he is a board certified osteopathic physician and certified homeopathist practicing in Guilderland in upstate New York, as well as a Clinical Assistant Professor in the Department of Preventative Medicine at New York Medical College.
In the past he was the president of the Homeopathic Medical Society of the State of New York, and the first vice president of the American institute of Homeopathy.
Larry has also served on the New York State Board for Professional Medical Conduct.
He is the author of a recent important book – “Green Medicine: Challenging the Assumptions of Conventional Medical Care” – which takes a hard look at the various failures of the present medical model for addressing the roots for preventing and treating disease.
